summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4158 for the improvement of Orcas Street from 52nd Avenue South to Seward Park Avenue; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 49697, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
